item.title: DNSPOD API SSL证书调整(subjectAltName)引起的报错
item.description: 报错信息如下： Python 2.7 (r27:82500, Jan 7 2014, 23:14:35) [GCC 4.1.2 20080704 (Red Hat 4.1.2-50)] on linux2 Type "help", "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information. >>> import requests >>> r = requests.get("https://dnsapi.cn") Traceback (most recent call last): File "<stdin>", line 1, in <module> File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requests-2.0.0-py2.7.egg/requests/api.py", line 55, in get return request('get', url, **kwargs) File "/usr/local/lib/python2.7/site-packages/requests-2.0.0-py2.7.egg/requests/api.py", line 44, in request return session.request(method=method, url=url, **kwargs) File
